note.p: Daughter of James Howell and his wife Joanna Job; baptised in Liverpool. Married Robert Hugh Job, her cousin, in 1851. Mother of Robert Arthur Job.
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 May 2018)
England & Wales, civil registration marriage index, 1837–1915 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 May 2018)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 May 2018)
letter from R. A. Job, 23 December 1879
